name: 7th GCEAS Global Conference on Engineering and Applied Science
content: 2024 Global Conference on Engineering and Applied Science (GCEAS) is scheduled to be held from November 21 - 23, 2024 in Taipei, Taiwan. 2024 GCEAS aims to provide a communication platform for scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students not only to present their recent and latest researches but also to share their thoughts and to discuss the future development in this area, but not limited to the field of Engineering and Applied Science. At GCEAS 2024, attendees will have the opportunity to participate in engaging presentations delivered by leading experts, providing valuable insights into various topics within engineering and applied science. Interactive discussions will delve into the latest trends, challenges, and opportunities shaping the future of our fields, fostering collaboration and knowledge exchange among participants.
